description: Generate detailed stories for a specific epic (Phase 2)
prerequisite: Run test_1_generate_epics.json first to get epics

project_summary.project_description: A simple task management application for students to track their assignments and deadlines

mvp_features: User can create, edit, and delete tasks
Tasks have title, description, due date, and priority
Users can mark tasks as complete
Simple dashboard showing upcoming and overdue tasks
Filter tasks by priority and status

epics.title: User Authentication & Account Management
epics.description: Implement complete user authentication system including signup, login, password reset, and profile management

stories: Array of 4 story objects with id, title, description, acceptance_criteria, technical_tasks, story_points, estimated_hours
